description.p: Defines what happens when the server loses connection with the app while processing an ajax callback.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Processing option for lost connection]* property defines what should happen when the server loses connection with the client application.

item.name: Stop
item.description: (Default) Server halts execution of server-side code when the connection is lost.

item.name: Continue
item.description: Server continues execution until the server-side code completes or the *[ui:Server processing duration]* timeout is reached.
